title: Pak Shuts Parks, Museums As Air Quality Worsens, Multans AQI Crosses 2,100
content: Pakistan's Punjab government in a bid to combat the hazardous smog conditions in the province, shut down amusement parks and museums for 10 days, from November 8 to 17, ARY News reported.
summary: Pakistan's Punjab government in a bid to combat the hazardous smog conditions in the province, shut down amusement parks and museums for 10 days, from November 8 to 17, ARY News reported.

title: Workers Directed To Avoid Homes With Trump Signs During Hurricane Milton
content: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis took to X (formerly Twitter) and announced an investigation into the matter.
summary: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis took to X (formerly Twitter) and announced an investigation into the matter.

title: Amid India-Canada Diplomatic Standoff, A Bombshell From Justin Trudeau
content: As the diplomatic standoff between India and Canada continues, Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau has admitted for the first time the presence of Khalistanis in his country.
summary: As the diplomatic standoff between India and Canada continues, Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau has admitted for the first time the presence of Khalistanis in his country.

title: "Dark Moments In History...": Biden On Attacks On Israeli Fans In Amsterdam
content: US President Joe Biden on Friday (local time) condemned the recent attacks on Israeli soccer fans in Amsterdam Friday, calling the incident "despicable and echo dark moments in history when Jews were persecuted."
summary: US President Joe Biden on Friday (local time) condemned the recent attacks on Israeli soccer fans in Amsterdam Friday, calling the incident "despicable and echo dark moments in history when Jews were persecuted."

title: Canada On "High Alert", Braces For Migrants Fleeing US After Trump Win
content: President-elect Donald Trump will return to the White House after winning a defining mandate in the November 5 elections.
summary: President-elect Donald Trump will return to the White House after winning a defining mandate in the November 5 elections.

title: Geomagnetic Shield Weakening Over North America, Claim Chinese Researchers
content: Over the last 30 years, the magnetic field strength in the region has dropped to a level that is barely above the global average.
summary: Over the last 30 years, the magnetic field strength in the region has dropped to a level that is barely above the global average.

title: Heat, Air Pollution, Disease: How Climate Change Affects Health
content: Record-breaking heat, extreme weather events, air pollution and the spread of infectious disease: climate change poses an already vast yet rising threat to the health of humans around the world, experts warn.
summary: Record-breaking heat, extreme weather events, air pollution and the spread of infectious disease: climate change poses an already vast yet rising threat to the health of humans around the world, experts warn.

title: Myanmar's War-Torn Rakhine Faces Famine With 2 Million People At Risk: UN
content: Myanmar's war-ravaged Rakhine state could face imminent famine according to a United Nations report, which estimates that more than two million people could be at the risk of starvation.
summary: Myanmar's war-ravaged Rakhine state could face imminent famine according to a United Nations report, which estimates that more than two million people could be at the risk of starvation.

title: Authorities Probing Bigoted Text Messages That Spread Alarm Across US
content: Federal and state authorities are investigating a wave of bigoted text messages sent anonymously that have spread alarm among Black Americans across the country this week, officials and recipients told Reuters.
summary: Federal and state authorities are investigating a wave of bigoted text messages sent anonymously that have spread alarm among Black Americans across the country this week, officials and recipients told Reuters.

title: Musk's SpaceX Working On Starlink Equivalent 'Marslink' For Red Planet
content: Musk took to X to confirm the development, adding that the ultimate goal was to increase the speed of data transfer across such vast distances.
summary: Musk took to X to confirm the development, adding that the ultimate goal was to increase the speed of data transfer across such vast distances.

title: 3rd Assassination Attempt On Trump? "Iran Asset" Charged For Plotting Murder
content: An Iranian man has been charged over an alleged plot by Iran's elite Revolutionary Guards Corps (IRGC) to kill Donald Trump - the United States president-elect who has already survived two attempts on his life.
summary: An Iranian man has been charged over an alleged plot by Iran's elite Revolutionary Guards Corps (IRGC) to kill Donald Trump - the United States president-elect who has already survived two attempts on his life.

title: Our Big Brain May Not Be Reason For Difficult Childbirth, Study Claims
content: The research suggests that human childbirth may not be complicated due to our need for large brains and pelvises suitable for upright walking.
summary: The research suggests that human childbirth may not be complicated due to our need for large brains and pelvises suitable for upright walking.

title: ChatGPT Faces Massive Outage, Thousands Of Users Impacted
content: Microsoft-backed OpenAI said that it was investigating the ChatGPT issue and working to restore functionality as soon as possible.
summary: Microsoft-backed OpenAI said that it was investigating the ChatGPT issue and working to restore functionality as soon as possible.

title: Pentagon Lifts Ban On Contractors Fixing US-Supplied Weapons In Ukraine
content: In its final months, President Joe Biden's administration has decided to allow US defense contractors to work in Ukraine to maintain and repair Pentagon-provided weaponry, US officials told Reuters on Friday.
summary: In its final months, President Joe Biden's administration has decided to allow US defense contractors to work in Ukraine to maintain and repair Pentagon-provided weaponry, US officials told Reuters on Friday.

title: Rapper Diddy Proposes $50 Million Bail Package After Being Denied Thrice
content: Sean "Diddy" Combs on Friday proposed a new $50 million bail package backed by his Florida mansion that the music mogul hopes will win his release from the Brooklyn jail where he has been held for eight weeks on criminal sex trafficking charges.
summary: Sean "Diddy" Combs on Friday proposed a new $50 million bail package backed by his Florida mansion that the music mogul hopes will win his release from the Brooklyn jail where he has been held for eight weeks on criminal sex trafficking charges.

title: Trump Prepares To Withdraw From Paris Climate Agreement: Report
content: US President-elect Trump's transition team has prepared executive orders and proclamations on withdrawing from Paris climate agreement and shrinking the size of some national monuments to allow more drilling and mining, the New York Times reported.
summary: US President-elect Trump's transition team has prepared executive orders and proclamations on withdrawing from Paris climate agreement and shrinking the size of some national monuments to allow more drilling and mining, the New York Times reported.

title: With Little Water, Displaced Lebanese Women Worry About Periods
content: For Rabab al-Hajj Youssef, every trip to the bathroom to change her sanitary pad is a painful experience. After Israeli strikes displaced her family from their home in Lebanon to a shelter, she shares limited water with hundreds of people.
summary: For Rabab al-Hajj Youssef, every trip to the bathroom to change her sanitary pad is a painful experience. After Israeli strikes displaced her family from their home in Lebanon to a shelter, she shares limited water with hundreds of people.

title: After Hamas Rejection Of Hostage Deal, US Asked Qatar To Expel The Group
content: The US has told Qatar that the presence of Hamas in Doha is no longer acceptable in the weeks since the Palestinian group rejected the latest proposal to achieve a ceasefire and a hostage deal, a senior administration official told Reuters on Friday.
summary: The US has told Qatar that the presence of Hamas in Doha is no longer acceptable in the weeks since the Palestinian group rejected the latest proposal to achieve a ceasefire and a hostage deal, a senior administration official told Reuters on Friday.

title: Vaccine Skeptic RFK Jr's New Mission Is To "Make America Healthy Again"
content: Robert F. Kennedy Jr., a longtime conspiracy theorist and opponent of vaccines, now has the ear of President-elect Donald Trump to promote what he's calling the "Make America Healthy Again" agenda.
summary: Robert F. Kennedy Jr., a longtime conspiracy theorist and opponent of vaccines, now has the ear of President-elect Donald Trump to promote what he's calling the "Make America Healthy Again" agenda.

title: 2017 Manchester Attack Survivors Win $58,000 Over Hoax Claims
content: Two survivors of the 2017 bomb attack at an Ariana Grande concert in Manchester, England, on Friday won £45,000 ($58,000) in damages from a former TV producer who claimed the attack was a hoax.
summary: Two survivors of the 2017 bomb attack at an Ariana Grande concert in Manchester, England, on Friday won £45,000 ($58,000) in damages from a former TV producer who claimed the attack was a hoax.
